featured.text: Prom night can be a dreadful experience for socially awkward teens or for those who do not secure dates.
The French were also slow to accept forks, for using them was thought to be awkward.

definition.zh_def: 笨拙的；不自然的；令人尷尬的
definition.en_def: Causing or feeling embarrassment or inconvenience; lacking grace or skill.
definition.example: He felt awkward during the conversation with someone he had just met.
